name: resinous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected with or producing resin (= a thick, sticky substance produced by some trees): Pine trees are resinous and burn easily. resinous forest smells See
resin
More examplesFewer examplesThe ground was covered with resinous pine needles.Before the ink is dry, it is dusted with a resinous powder.the hot and resinous perfume of the rain forest
